serveur

Class DataSocketAdministrator

  • java.lang.Object
    • serveur.DataSocketAdministrator

  • public class DataSocketAdministrator
extends java.lang.Object
    class used to administrate a data socket provide 1 function to init a new socket on ip and port 1 other to init from a socketserver 2 function to read and write on socket and 1 to close and reset the socket
    Author:
    dufaux

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DataSocketAdministrator(ObjectCreator creat) 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      close the current socket and set null the variables.
      void initNew(int port, java.lang.String adresse)
      init a new socket to connect with a client
      void initNewPassive(java.net.ServerSocket srv)
      init socket from serversocket (used in passiv mode)
      void read(java.io.BufferedOutputStream bos)
      read in the socket and copy it on the bufferedoutputstream
      void write(byte[] data)
      write data on socket
